ygData.messageBody:
> YOU HAVE MADE MY DAY!!!!!! Finally a new weapon, i'm so excited to get
> home. Hope charismatic carillon plus the dark elf illusion of the mask of
> the deceiver gets me there, i've never been to neriak. Might try a mule.
> We'll see, thanks so much for this post John!

I found out about this quest a few days ago and have been trying to
complete it (since I have a lute in the bank). Unfortunately, while I know
I won't have trouble finding Lord Grimrot, since he's always in the same
place, I haven't had any luck finding Dekam N'Tazi (with a DE SK mule). No
one I've talked to has seen him either.

If anyone spots him, please let us know where. =)
